welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South Portland! Get ready to experience the charm of our coastal town and discover its many gems, from our scenic beaches to our delicious seafood. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at International Jetport Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at International Jetport Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
